snippet.title: DOWNWARD Enhanced - Release date trailer
snippet.description:
The mysterious apocalyptic world of Downward by Caracal Games is coming back to challenge you! 🏃 
 Coming to Nintendo Switch, PS5, Xbox Series on JUNE 4th 🥳
👉 Wishlist now: https://downwardenhanced.com/
🏃  Parkour in a first-person platformer
🔀 New alternative endings

🏃 What's Downward?
This first-person open-world parkour based platform adventure is set in the medieval ruins of a post-apocalyptic planet Earth. Make your way through breath-taking landscapes, face ancient guardians and unravel the deep mystery that lies behind the disappearance of humanity.

🧡 Twitter: https://twitter.com/DearVillagers
💜 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dearvillagers/
🧡 Discord: https://discord.gg/dearvillagers
💜 Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dearvillagers
🧡 BeReal: @dearvillagers

#parkour 

tags: downward, downward enhanced, release date ,release date trailer, caracal games, parkour, first person game, indie game, action game, adventure game, dear villagers, post apocalyptic
